rows.label: qst640404_msg0001
rows.name: And you are...?

rows.label: qst640404_msg0002
rows.name:
I see...
So Feline and the others were worried...

rows.label: qst640404_msg0003
rows.name:
In that case, maybe you'd like to
give us a hand here, hm?

rows.label: qst640404_msg0004
rows.name:
The plant's having some technical
difficulties right now. The machinery's
acting up...

rows.label: qst640404_msg0005
rows.name:
That's why I sent Gisisi and
Olek to run repairs on the higher
floors of the facility...

rows.label: qst640404_msg0006
rows.name:
Meanwhile, Salaf's supposed to be
getting us the materials we need to
patch everything up.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0007
rows.name:
...However, none of the three's
come back yet.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0008
rows.name:
Hope they've not run into trouble.
Could you find them for me and help
them with whatever they need...?

rows.label: qst640404_msg0009
rows.name: Thank you, friend.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0010
rows.name:
...Before you go, I should tell you this.
Have you been to the second floor
of the plant before?

rows.label: qst640404_msg0011
rows.name:
You can get there by taking a gondola
from the Sm√πide Plant back in town.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0012
rows.name:
It's a security measure, I guess.
Keeps undesirables out. Still,
sorry 'bout the hassle...

rows.label: qst640404_msg0013
rows.name: I'm indebted to you, friends.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0101
rows.name:
Thanks, friends. Thanks to you,
the plant's running smooth again.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0102
rows.name: And we can all finally head home.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0103
rows.name:
I must express gratitude to you,
and to our daughters.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0104
rows.name:
You might think I've got a lot of
nerve, but I actually have one last
request. Will you hear it?

rows.label: qst640404_msg0105
rows.name:
I'd like you to let Feline and her friends
know we're coming soon.

rows.label: qst640404_msg0106
rows.name:
They've been worrying long enough.
I want to take that burden off their
shoulders as soon as I can...

rows.label: qst640404_msg0107
rows.name: Yet again, thank you.
